issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

Any euca2ools command will fail if executed on the CLC if the euca2ools configuration file has been created to be with euca2ools, and the region hasn't been defined after the @ sign.

*euca2ools configuration file*
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# cat .euca/euca2ools.ini
[global]
default-region = ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors

[user admin]
key-id = AKIRWNGGUYHIQJ5AP8X5
secret-key = qSIt4cYaXlagHyBcxM4qTEkQOrN4FKF1hkgxnFHz
account-id = 944786667073
private-key = /root/euca2-admin-9dada18a-pk.pem
certificate = /root/euca2-admin-9dada18a-cert.pem

[user account1-user01]
key-id = AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA
secret-key = X6iF2kYYZ4jQxfO8p5Zsgb7j4G6aVF8CluvAdj6G
account-id = 408396244283
private-key = /root/account1-user01/euca2-user01-faad606c-pk.pem
certificate = /root/account1-user01/euca2-user01-faad606c-cert.pem

[user account2-user11]
key-id = AKIR6NBEBTXJ0PAWKBDP
secret-key = CdyEgKvaA6SKckg5uXP8TPm70mQRadRjIKz71Ogg
account-id = 758815488612

[region ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors]
autoscaling-url = http://autoscaling.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
ec2-url = http://compute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
elasticloadbalancing-url = http://loadbalancing.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
iam-url = http://euare.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
monitoring-url = http://cloudwatch.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
sts-url = http://tokens.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
s3-url = http://objectstorage.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
certificate = /root/cloud-cert.pem
eustore-url = http://emis.eucalyptus.com
{code}

*example commands*
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose --region admin@
euca-describe-availability-zones: error: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instance-types --show-capacity --by-zone --region admin@
euca-describe-instance-types: error: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euare-accountlist --region admin@
euare-accountlist: error: missing access key ID; please supply one with -I
{code}

*Workaround*

Use the region name after the '@' sign when running commands.  For example:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euare-accountlist --region admin@localhost
account2	758815488612
account1	408396244283
eucalyptus	944786667073
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	801554391349

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instance-types --show-capacity --by-zone --region admin@localhost
AVAILABILITYZONE	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
INSTANCETYPE	Name         CPUs  Memory (MiB)  Disk (GiB)  Used / Total  Used %
INSTANCETYPE	t1.micro        1           256           5     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.small        1           512          10     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.medium       1          1024          10     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	c1.xlarge       2          2048          10     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.large        2          1024          15     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	c1.medium       1          1024          20     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.xlarge       2          1024          30     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m2.2xlarge      2          4096          30     0 /     2      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m3.2xlarge      4          4096          30     0 /     2      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m2.xlarge       2          2048          40     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m3.xlarge       2          2048          50     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	cc1.4xlarge     8          3072          60     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	m2.4xlarge      8          4096          60     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	hi1.4xlarge     8          6144         120     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cc2.8xlarge    16          6144         120     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cg1.4xlarge    16         12288         200     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cr1.8xlarge    16         16384         240     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	hs1.8xlarge    48        119808       24000     0 /     0

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instance-types --show-capacity --by-zone --region admin@ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
AVAILABILITYZONE	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
INSTANCETYPE	Name         CPUs  Memory (MiB)  Disk (GiB)  Used / Total  Used %
INSTANCETYPE	t1.micro        1           256           5     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.small        1           512          10     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.medium       1          1024          10     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	c1.xlarge       2          2048          10     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.large        2          1024          15     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	c1.medium       1          1024          20     0 /    12      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m1.xlarge       2          1024          30     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m2.2xlarge      2          4096          30     0 /     2      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m3.2xlarge      4          4096          30     0 /     2      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m2.xlarge       2          2048          40     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	m3.xlarge       2          2048          50     0 /     6      0%
INSTANCETYPE	cc1.4xlarge     8          3072          60     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	m2.4xlarge      8          4096          60     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	hi1.4xlarge     8          6144         120     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cc2.8xlarge    16          6144         120     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cg1.4xlarge    16         12288         200     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	cr1.8xlarge    16         16384         240     0 /     0
INSTANCETYPE	hs1.8xlarge    48        119808       24000     0 /     0
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

Just using the user name followed by the @ sign and no region defined in previous versions of euca2ools would work with no problem.  Looks like 'default-region' option is not being honored.  Not sure if this can be called a regression or not.
fields.summary: euca2ools configured with euca2ools configuration file with 'default-region' fails on CLC
fields.environment:
* non-HA, single cluster
** 1 x CLC
** 1 x UFS, Walrus
** 1 x UFS
** 1 x CC, SC (Overlay)
** 2 x NC
* output of euca-describe-services

comments.body: Heh.  The parser thinks your user name is "admin@".  This is fixed in requestbuilder 0.2.1.
I uploaded a new python-requestbuilder-0.2.1-0.1.el6 package to be released alongside euca2ools 4.0.0.  Try testing with that.

Thanks [~gholms].  Tested and works no problem.

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# yum install -y python-requestbuilder.noarch
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
